text: Michel Camdessus (born 1 May 1933) is a French economist and administrator. He was Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) from 16 January 1987 to 14 February 2000. Camdessus is also a member of the Fondation Chirac's board of directors,Fondation Chirac's board of directors ever since the foundation was launched in 2008 by former French president Jacques Chirac. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biographical Information (IMF) * Biography on Africa Progress panel website Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:French economists Category:Managing Directors of the International Monetary Fund
title: Michel Camdessus
